const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "test",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      comments: {
        type: "nested",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "test",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    title: "Test title",
    comments: [
      {
        author: "kimchy",
        number: 1,
      },
      {
        author: "nik9000",
        number: 2,
      },
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.search({
  index: "test",
  query: {
    nested: {
      path: "comments",
      query: {
        match: {
          "comments.number": 2,
        },
      },
      inner_hits: {},
    },
  },
});
console.log(response2);
